mapper.insert: INSERT INTO calendar_schedule_tb ( user_id, title, label_color, start_date, end_date, is_all_day, start_time, end_time, location, repeat_type, repeat_cycle, repeat_end_date, repeat_count, description ) VALUES ( #{userId}, #{title}, #{labelColor}, #{startDate}, #{endDate}, #{isAllDay}, #{startTime}, #{endTime}, #{location}, #{repeatType}, #{repeatCycle}, #{repeatEndDate}, #{repeatCount}, #{description} )
